attributes.action: Dedicate a Royal Navy ship to the late Henry Allingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the last of the WWI lions and the oldest man in the world it would be appropriate to commemorate the life of this man by naming a Royal Navy vessel HMS Henry Allingham.

rejection.details: Please contact the Navy with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
